main event: A witness in Hampton, Virginia observed bright, pulsating lights in the sky that hovered below the tree line, emitting a high-pitched whining sound, on November 13, 1967.
interesting points: The lights were round and pulsating,The witness observed the lights for about 10 minutes before they faded from view,The incident was noted to be similar to previous sightings in the area,This was the closest and longest duration of the lights observed by the witness,No identifiable aircraft were present during the sighting.
